segments.text: I notice the girl standing patiently, her hand raised and open, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so eager, it’s almost contagious, and I find myself smiling at her enthusiasm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I glance back at the boy, and my heart drops a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so unsteady on that stool; it scares me to think of him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t shake the feeling that the woman should be aware of all this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her calm demeanor feels misplaced amidst the impending disaster unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange juxtaposition, this idyllic garden outside and the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
